summary:
PUBG is a popular video game where up to 100 players parachute onto an island. They search for weapons and fight to be the last one standing. The playing area gets smaller, forcing players to confront each other. It was inspired by a Japanese movie and started as a mod for other games.

First released in 2017 for PC and Xbox, it later came to mobile, PlayStation, and Google Stadia. PUBG is free to play and has sold over 75 million copies, becoming one of the best-selling games ever. It has also won many awards and is popular in esports.
title: PUBG Battlegrounds
